reviews.review: Это классика блять, это знать надо!

This game is a masterpiece, a classic and probably one of the best I've played. Valve is known to release major games and most of them are some of the most memorable games there are. This is a game that was released in 1998 and it still holds up today as a fantastic game. I cannot recommend this game enough and Steam has it on sale all the time so just pick it up, you won't be disappointed. The only thing I would complain about is how the story ends because it is so abrupt. It left me with a lot of questions but I suppose that's what the next games are for, right?
classic. amazing story, gameplay, puzzles, and atmosphere.

进去就卡死加闪退的把输入法改成英文的。
老版游戏一般都不支持中文输入法。
中文输入法的瞬间输入量过大会造成老软件的数据溢出。
这游戏总共才500多M
它的缓存也不可能非常大。
我通关了！不得不说神作当之无愧，剧情和关卡设计层层相扣，吹爆戈登！

The lack of instructions and arrows to tell you where to go are part of what makes this game immersive (even though the graphics haven't aged well). It is also, in a sense, a weakness, as I was sometimes stuck, not knowing what to do, because no interactive object really stands out (aside from, what, the red buttons?). And not knowing where to go too, I found the backtracking really confusing. 
The large variety of weapons calls for strategy. Count your ammo too, sometimes you're short! Again, the lack of instructions on how to use some weapons is hindering progression. Especially when you haven't seen anyone use that weapon in front if you, so you don't even know what it is supposed to do (if you know the one I am talking about, seriously, tell me: how were we supposed to know?). Some weapons are dangerous in close quarters, experimenting could end badly :,)
Some parts of the game are plain traps, you have to die at least once to know how to avoid/get prepared. I don't really care, I save often, but new player beware!
Some jumps are tricky, and frustrating. Those are rare, and the way you can use the map is interesting! Screw ladders though. And screw those people who are supposed to follow you and open doors, sometimes they won't...
A lot of different maps, even if some don't make sense, you still get the feeling you went through half the globe lol

Купил заместо второй ибо нищий. Но не жалею. Вполне интересная игра. Обязательно накатите модификацию Restored (она в Стиме есть, к слову), она сделает графику не такой больной для глаз. Рекомендую каждому, КАЖДОМУ БЛ_ТЬ.
A masterpiece. My favourite first person shooter game of all time.

That rock is full of MAGIC

Half Life é um jogo que atravessa gerações!

Sinto muito por aqueles que estão deixando de jogar esse game pelos gráficos antigos pois, o jogo vai muito além disso! Nós controlamos um cientista de 27 anos. Ele está atrasado para o serviço e precisa chegar ao laboratório de testes para uma análise de um material desconhecido, até que... tudo vai pelos ares! Logo de cara o jogo nos coloca em um cenário caótico em que nós, assim como o protagonista, não fazemos ideia do que está acontecendo. É um mapa gigantesco para um jogo dos anos 90 e cada fase possuí um puzzle diferente que fica a nossa escolha a melhor forma de resolve-lo (Alô fãs de Portal 1/2!). É tão bom que terminamos com um gostinho de quero mais.

Durante a gameplay nos deparamos com: elienígenas, monstros, entidades misteriosas, cientistas gritando, seguranças da instalação, jumpscares, labirintos, quebra-cabeças, exército, alarmes de segurança, mais explosões, portais abertos de um lado para o outro, planetas (ou lugares?) alienígena e muito além disso!

O jogo possui 02 finais, bem simples até, mas daqueles que nos deixam com a pulga atrás da orelha, uma vez que termina de forma muito abrupta. Se você gosta de DOOM, QUAKE, WOLFENSTEIN e PORTAL, você vai adorar Half Life! 

Vale lembrar que é um jogo muito leve, muito leve MESMO! Lembro-me que foi um dos pouquíssimos jogos que rodou a 60 FPS no meu falecido Celeron de 01 GB RAM e sem placa de vídeo. Posso dizer com tranquilidade que é mais leve do que GTA San Andreas, CS 1.6 e todo e qualquer jogo 2D moderno.
It was me. I ate all the donuts.

I mean what can I say other than the fact that this game is a masterpiece!

Bom e legal, ele não me atrai a jogar muito mas peguei o pique de jogar para entender melhor como se passa no mundo do HALF LIFE desde o 1. Esse é o único jogo que roda a 60 fps cravados em minha maquina.
Se você tem um hardware antigo e quer jogar um jogo bom, está aí!
This is very great game, everyone knows it. I've finished it 3 times and i can say that this game is awesome.

This game just wants you dead. Around every corner, is another enemy, and after you kill them, another spawns behind you. There are many sections were either the environment will kill you, or a well placed Mounted Machine gun, rocket launcher or sniper planted by the HECU will. Some parts of this game are outright near impossible, rage inducing, I hit my keyboard and almost broke my monitor because of this game, but the amazing cut scenes, puzzles, and story kept me going. Half Life is truly an amazing game for its time, and still is an amazing game. Just a little bit to get used to, with Freeman being able to run like Sonic, and jump like a frog, but when he hits the ground, half the time he dies. Moral of the story, don't do your first play through of this game on hardest difficulty, it will absolutely screw you. it is a must for a person who wants to play classics.
I couldn't defeat at the last boss, Good game.

If there was a button to skip the wiggedy wack opening trolley ride I would rate this the most explosive fiction of our generation. However it must settle for being simply 9/10 bargain bin bozo bonger. Gotta get it if you want to see what real game design looks like. Also just turn the game off once you reach Xen, there is no hope in that place.

A gaming classic, Half-Life does not hold up as much as it sued to. However, when judged against other games of the time, Half-Life is a technologically innovative and feat in visual storytelling. 7/10.
es un juegaso pense que era aburrido pero me retracto es super entretenido y mas si lo juegas con tus amigos lo recomiendo mucho

A classic pc shooter that tells its story without cutscenes but gameplay and atmosphere. Im not going to spoil to much but at the start of the game you travel to the entrance of the lab by train in the black mesa complex. which is kinda part of the portal story but don't worry about it. Anyways throughout the whole ride theirs alot shown with the environments of the facility showing the process of the maintenance in the building going deeper and deeper down from the rails. Truly a great introduction in video games that you can only see once. Because after that it only gets boring with it being so long that you cant even skip. I guess they didn't have that technology back in 1998. I think that's all I need to say. Theirs is a huge point at the start that changes everything but that all I need to say. You should probably play the first in the series before the others. The story gets very complicated fast. That's all I need to say... about the story! don't even get me started on the gameplay. "You cant do it". Who said that? O i'm getting started now. The gameplay is incredible I don't really think that the guns are what make the gameplay fun its the enemy and item placement the really shines. The movement is a bit weird with long jumps and walking for no reason. Just play the game then play half life 2 that's where it really gets good. I mean really good. If I had 2$ for every time I said gameplay I could buy this game again. So go play it!
coe meno, quem nao jogou ta na merda slk
An amazing game which, i my opinion, still holds up today. would recommend to anyone even those who have played black mesa as they are very different games.
Good game, If the graphics look old then play Black Mesa instead.
